# APS Revit Cloud Model Automation Project

This project enables remote triggering of Revit Cloud Model publishing via Autodesk Platform Services (APS) Design Automation.

## Project Status
- [x] Project structure created
- [x] Configuration files set up
- [x] Backend implementation complete
- [x] Frontend UI created
- [x] Revit AppBundle project scaffolded
- [x] Documentation complete
